Container.Name: Pomerium Proxy
Container.Overview: Pomerium Nginx Proxy - Secure, identity-aware access from anywhere.
Container.Description: Secure, identity-aware access from anywhere. Access internal resources securely. Implement zero trust. Achieve compliance. All without the headache of a VPN.

Config.Name: Pomerium Domain
Config.Description: If you have a wildcard domain name on DuckDNS or elsewhere, please put it here eg 'example.duckdns.org'

Config.Name: Pomerium upstream container
Config.Description: The Pomerium container Host:[Port] to use as Pomerium upstream

Config.Name: Pomerium verify upstream container
Config.Description: The Pomerium container Host:[Port] to use as Verify upstream

Config.Name: Forward Auth URL
Config.Description: Forward server name. The name will be concateneted with POMERIUM_DOMAIN. Remember to create the appropriate rules on your reverse proxy web server

Config.Name: Authenticate Service URL
Config.Description: Pomerium Authenticate server name. The name will be concateneted with POMERIUM_DOMAIN. Remember to create the appropriate rules on your reverse proxy web server

Config.Name: Verify Service URL
Config.Description: Pomerium Verify server name. The name will be concatenated with POMERIUM_DOMAIN. Remember to create the appropriate rules on your reverse proxy web server

Config.Name: SSL Certificate
Config.Description: The SSL certificate from the NginxProxyManager volume

Config.Name: SSL Certificate Key
Config.Description: The SSL certificate key from the NginxProxyManager volume

Config.Name: NginxProxyManager Letsencrypt SSL folder
Config.Description: Nginx Proxy Manager Letsencrypt SSL certificate folder that can be found in /appdata/NginxProxyManager/letsencrypt
